Hi Roselle,

Please find the recommended amendments to the insurance section.


Insurance
20.1. The Operator will, during the Term, keep the Premises and all property of the Hotel Operator within the premises therein insured, at its own cost, against loss or damage by fire, explosion, or other harm at full replacement cost. in the sum of AED 5,000,000 and indemnify the Hotel against any such loss or damage.
20.2. For the duration of this Agreement, the Operator shall be responsible for full business and public liability in respect of loss, damage, or personal injury arising out of the operation of the Business or as a result of the acts or omissions of the Operator affecting third parties. Therefore, the Operator shall, at its own cost, maintain comprehensive insurance for a sum of not less than AED 5,000,000 throughout the Term to meet all business and public liability claims by third parties for loss of or damage to property and personal injury and shall indemnify the Hotel against any such claims.

,000 throughout the Term to meet all business and public liability claims by third parties for loss of or damage to property and personal injury and shall indemnify the Hotel against any such claims. The insurance cover referred to in this clause shall be obtained by the Operator from an repuited insurance company licensed to operate with the UAE approved by the Hotel. All insurance policies required under this clause shall name the Hotel, Manager, and Kempinski Hospitality SPV Ltd. as co-insured and contain a waiver of subrogation clause in favour of the Hotel, Manager, ADNH, and Kempinski Hospitality SPV Ltd. In the event of the Operator failing to maintain such insurance, the Hotel will be entitled to purchase such insurance and recover the cost from the Operator.
20.3. The Operator shall, at the request of the Hotel, provide the Hotel with evidence of the insurance policies required under this clause 20 and the payment of premiums in respect thereof.
20.4. The Operator shall not do or suffer or permit to be done anything which may render any policy or policies of insurance held by the Hotel void or voidable.
Let me know if you need anything else.
